DOC.brief_summary: A ONE YEAR SAFETY STUDY FOR PATIENTS WHO COMPLETE STUDY VAA489A2307.
DOC.brief_title: A Year Long Study to Evaluate the Safety of the Combination of Valsartan (320 mg) and Amlodipine (5 mg) in Patients With Hypertension
DOC.criteria: SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF VAA489A2307 CORE TRIAL VISIT 7 BLOOD PRESSURE MUST BE MSDBP ≤ 95 mmHg AND MSSBP ≤ 150 mmHg PATIENTS WHO EXPERIENCED ANY ADVERSE EVENTS CONSIDERED SERIOUS AND DRUG RELATED IN VAA489A2307 CORE Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
